name: bashing
content:

[ U ] strong criticism of a particular type of person or thing: There's been a lot of banker-bashing lately.
[ U ] a physical attack on someone: recent incidents of gay-bashing
[ U ] mainly UK (also a bashing [ S ]) the act of hitting something hard: All steaks will benefit from a bashing, as this breaks up the muscle fibres that comprise most of the meat.
